description: A dataset containing nine sustainability indicators for 18 elements commonly used in HEAs.

indicators.name: Raw Material Price
indicators.description: The market price of the element in its pure form.

indicators.name: Supply Risk
indicators.description: Probability of supply disruptions due to geopolitical or natural factors.

indicators.name: Normalized Vulnerability to Supply Restriction
indicators.description: Scarcity metric adjusted for global availability.

indicators.name: Embodied Energy
indicators.description: The energy required for primary production of the element.

indicators.name: Water Usage
indicators.description: The water consumed in the production of the element.

indicators.name: Rock-to-Metal Ratio
indicators.description: Intensity of land use during mining operations.

indicators.name: Human Health Damage
indicators.description: Aggregate impact of element production on human health.

indicators.name: Human Rights Pressure
indicators.description: Metric of human rights concerns in sourcing regions.

indicators.name: Labor Rights Pressure
indicators.description: Metric of labor rights concerns in sourcing regions.
